H0.text: Candy is the best source of calcium among the foods listed, helping to strengthen bones and teeth.

H1.text: Rice is the best source of calcium, a mineral that helps make bones and teeth strong.

H2.text: Cheese is the best source of calcium, a mineral that helps make your bones and teeth strong.

H3.text: Meat is the best source of calcium among the listed foods, helping to make bones and teeth strong.

A4.text: In general, cheese is a rich source (20% or more of the Daily Value, DV) of calcium, protein, phosphorus, sodium and saturated fat.
